A Sakura Wars-Shinsengumi crossover. Hijikata Toshizou has just entered the 
story as of the end of Chapter 3, and Nagakura has already made his 
appearance. Next up, Saitou and (maybe) Nakano Takeko!

http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2297676/1/

You may add this to the Shinsengumi database, if possible (as well as the 
previously posted Joshigun fic, available on 
http://www.fictionpress.com/read.php?storyid=1852528
